fields.title: Certificate verification
fields.question: Can you show us your original academic and training certificates?
fields.answer: Sure. Here are my academic certificates and here are my internship and training certificates. I have not graduated yet, I am in the final year. Here are the provisional certificate and Grade report.

fields.title: Background mismatch
fields.question: I see that your background is in Electronics and Communication engineering. Why do you want this job and not something closely related to your field?
fields.answer: My broad engineering background helps me to look at projects from a wider perspective. Your company is a leader in business solutions. You are already working on integrating your traditional ERP solution with AI and ML-based business analytics. I took a few courses in computer science, did a small project on that during my training and found it very exciting to see how much we can learn from the existing data and make smart decisions. I want to learn more about it and apply it to solve real problems. I think this position will give me the right opportunity to contribute something significant to a futuristic product of your company.

fields.title: Achievement
fields.question: What is your greatest achievement? Can you tell us about one accomplishment that you are really proud of? or What is the most difficult thing you have ever done?
fields.answer: When I was working on my project (or at my current job, or during my internship), I hit an obstacleâ€”our method just did not work; it produced unreasonable results. We tried many modifications, struggled for months, still the results were far from measured data. My guide and I thought we chose the wrong path and probably should abandon it. I was thinking about it day and night. One Saturday morning about 3 AM, I got an idea to solve that problem. I woke up and worked out the mathematics. I went to my lab and quickly changed our program and ran it, which produced quite reasonable results. I got very excited and refined the code and played with a few input parameters, the results were very satisfactory. On Monday morning, I showed my work to my guide, he was very happy. My project was essentially finished and we will publish our work soon. That was possibly my biggest accomplishment so far.

fields.title: Publication
fields.question: So, in which journal are you planning to publish it?
fields.answer: In the International Journal for Computational Science and Engineering. However, first, we will submit it as a conference paper. I hope it gets accepted. It will be exciting to go to a conference and present our paper.

fields.title: Continuous improvement
fields.question: The technology is changing very fast. How do you plan to keep pace with the changes and stay productive?
fields.answer: Yes, technology is changing rapidly. I like the changes and am always excited to learn new technologies. I spend some time every week learning about which institutes and industries are working on what new technology. And if something looks interesting, I delve into it, learn it and see how and where I can apply it to create new products to stay ahead instead of being a passive follower or user.

fields.title: New technology
fields.question: Can you give an example of some new technology you have learned recently and where it can be useful?
fields.answer: Yes, currently I am learning about semi-supervised learning. I am thinking that I can combine that with the expert systems in product design to increase the speed and reduce the cost of new product development.

fields.title: Project management
fields.question: If after a few months you are given a small project to manage, do you think you can handle it? or Do you have any project management experience that can be used at our company?
fields.answer: I have tried to manage my academic project like an industry project--planning, gathering requirements, setting milestones, progress reviews, and even budgeting. I have used Microsoft Project software to help me with project management. I am confident that at your company I can learn more about project management and the tools you use in a short time and take up such responsibilities.

fields.title: Explaining gaps
fields.question: You graduated last year. Can you tell us what you have been doing since then?
fields.answer: I had a good idea about designing a product. I wanted to finish it before taking up a job. I worked very hard and finally finished it a couple of months ago. Additionally, I took two online courses on advanced Data science and Machine learning, which will help me in my profession?

fields.title: Proof of claims
fields.question: Do you have the certificates of those courses? And where is your product going to be used? Can you show us your product or the report?
fields.answer: Yes. I have the certificates, here are the copies. And here is a brief description of the product. It is currently used in our college laboratory. Hopefully, many other colleges will use it too. I can give a demo if you have time.

fields.title: Right person
fields.question: Why do you think you should get this job?, What makes you the best candidate for this job? or Why are you the right person for this job?
fields.answer: I have checked all the requirements for this position. I sincerely believe I am qualified for it. I have seen the job description and it matches very well with what I would like to do. If I am given a chance, I will give my 100% to perform and deliver for the benefit of the company and for myself. I am confident that I am the right candidate for this position and surely will not disappoint you.

fields.title: Salary
fields.question: How much salary are you expecting? Or What's your salary expectations?
fields.answer: I am a recent graduate and money is not the biggest concern for me. I want to learn, contribute and grow in this company. So, I am just expecting whatever the standard salary for this kind of position is.

fields.title: Extra-curricular
fields.question: How do you spend your non-working hours?, What extra-curricular activities do you do?
fields.answer: I have started taking an evening yoga class. On the weekends, I go jogging with a few friends. Sometimes we get together and hold discussions on various issues. I volunteer at a local school to teach programming to students.

fields.title: self-improvement
fields.question: Tell me one thing you want to get better at. Are you doing anything for self-improvement?
fields.answer: I realize that I can manage my time better. I am working on making myself more efficient by planning my time in half-hour slots and sticking to the plan.

fields.title: Question for interviewer 1
fields.question: Well, I think we have learned quite a bit about you. Do you have any question for us?
fields.answer: Yes, could you please tell me about the people in the team in which I will have to work? Are they all computer scientists, engineers, and programmers?

fields.title: Question for interviewer 2
fields.question: Most of the team members are software developers and a few systems engineers from the electrical engineering background. There are also a couple of mathematicians in the group too. Anything else?
fields.answer: I have gone through the job description and have an overall idea about it. I would like to know a bit more about the day-to-day work I am expected to do in this position.

fields.title: Job details
fields.question: Initially, most of the work you would be expected to do would be to programming, testing, documentation, etc. Later you may have to go to the clients and trouble-shoot their problems, demo new releases and train them, and so on. Anything else?
fields.answer: That sounds very exciting. That's all I wanted to know for now. Thank you very much.

fields.title: Ending
fields.question: Well, we are also finished with the interview. We will let you know about our decision early next week.
fields.answer: Thank you very much for giving me this opportunity. I look forward to hearing from you.
